constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL SB1  South of the Borough

description: Erection of single storey rear extension, rear dormer and hip to gable roof extensions with installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The proposed extension and alterations fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The existing dwellinghouse comprises a terrace house. The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) provides the following definition for a terrace house: "terrace house" means a dwellinghouse situated in a row of three or more buildingsAccording to the Council's records, Nos. 25 and 27 are lawfully in use as two houses, as such no. 29 is considered to form part of a terrace. Paragraph (d) of Class B, permits a roof extension occupying a volume of up to 40 cubic metres for a terrace house, as the proposal would exceed 40 cubic metres, the proposal would fall outside of permitted development.

The submitted application form shows meeting and advice, the fee require for meeting only is £3,744.00, the fee for advice only is £3,744.00 and the fee for both meeting and advice is £7,000.00. We acknowledge the receipt of £3,744.00. Please pay the outstanding balance if the pre-app is for both meeting and advice.Payment can be made online via the Kingston council website or our Contact Centre on 020 8547 5002
The submitted proposed elevations are labelled as existing elevations, please revise the proposed elevations with the correct labelling.
